channel.title: Suggested distro for host on usb?
channel.description:
Hi, I want to install whonix on usb (is it not ok for some reason?). I would directly install debian as host on usb but i wonder if there are some other stable, debian based (since then i think i will install kicksecure) and maybe security focused distro that are lighter than debian. is a linux like that exist?
Thanks
